avatars.intro: I’m Adam—back-of-house turned on-camera—and I’m at the Avatar Performance Auditions to keep Monkey Business sharp, timed, and strangely charismatic without begging for attention.
avatars.background: Adam treats performance like a live system: clear cues, clean timing, and zero wasted motion. He’s auditioning to be the “anchor” performer in Monkey Business—the reliable spine that makes everyone else’s chaos read as intentional.
